word_mean: ［拉］坐骨神经痛：一种综合征，特征为疼痛从背部放射到臀部并沿背后面或侧面到下肢，其病因最常见者为由椎间盘突出引起。此术语也用指沿坐骨神经传导的别处的疼痛

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin sciatica (passio) ('affliction) of sciatica', feminine of sciaticus, from Greek iskhiadikos (see sciatic)

entry.def: Sciatica is a severe pain in the nerve in your legs or the lower part of your back.
